name: tomorow-night-eigthies-variant
description: Atom syntax theme using the ever popular Tomorrow Night Eighties colors with a Dark and Light theme variant.
readme:
# Tomorrow Night Eighties (light) Atom Syntax Theme

Atom syntax theme using the ever popular Tomorrow Night Eighties colors:

![](https://github.com/ChrisKempson/Tomorrow-Theme/raw/master/Images/Tomorrow-Night-Eighties-Palette.png)

## What's different in this version?

- HTML tag brackets same color as HTML tag name.

- Angular 2 HTML syntax support with [this HTML language package](https://github.com/dracine-hub/language-html-ng2). (forked from Github's [language-html](https://github.com/atom/language-html) package.

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dracine-hub/my-eighties-dark-theme-syntax/master/capture.png)

> Check out the [Tomorrow Night Eighties (light) Atom Syntax Theme](https://github.com/dracine-hub/my-eighties-light-theme-syntax)

Cheers!

***

Syntax theme project forked from [rockymadden](https://atom.io/themes/tomorrow-night-eighties-syntax)
